message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate your product, $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $180 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $160.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $130, which is the absolute maximum I can afford. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $160 is still a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to come down a bit further. I can offer it to you for $145.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but $145 is still out of my price range. I'm willing to go up to $135. This is my final offer.
I understand that $145 is still a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to come down a bit further. I can offer it to you for $140.
